Performer:
4.md (竹澤団七)

Alternate Name: Takezawa Danjirō IV (竹澤団二郎 (四))

Dates: '1981/04-'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
